content.p: Please find below the contact details for the Chief Financial Officer and the Finance and Infrastruture Senior Team Full contact information including their biography is available by clicking on the individual's name An organisation chart for the Finance and Infrastructure team can be accessed on our Directorate page General contact details for each of the individual sections within the Finance and Infrastructure team can be found on our Contacts page or by visiting the appropriate department websites Chief Financial Officer Room A18 Trent Building University Park Nottingham, NG7 2NR Telephone: +44 (0) 115 82 32480 Contact details for the each of the separate divisions that comprise the Finance and Infrastructure team can be found on our contacts page.
